# render(in:for:)

**Instance Method**

Draw the captions for the time you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func render(in ctx: CGContext, for time: CMTime)
```

## Parameters

- **ctx**: The drawing content.
- **time**: The time value for which the system draws the captions.
title: render(in:for:)
